representation_information.name: ISO/IEC 14496-2:2004. Information technology -- Coding of audio-visual objects -- Part 2: Visual. Advanced Simple Profile (formal name); MPEG-4, Visual Coding, Advanced Simple Profile (common name)
representation_information.description: Video encoding in MPEG-4 Visual family. Is useful in Internet streaming applications and other low bandwidth applications but can also scale to television broadcast quality.

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
